name: mern-testing
description: MERN Stack Application with Comprehensive Testing

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:client && npm run test:unit:server
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:client && npm run test:integration:server
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:watch:client & npm run test:watch:server
